Detailed Description

\class: CServerMonitor \file: CServerMonitor.h.

Monitors a TCP/IP socket for connection requests. When a connection request is available, returns. Note that it is up to the reactor to actually accept the connection request. ServerMonitors can have monitors which are descended from CFdMoniitors
